summary: The diff implements a comprehensive fix for the confluence filtering issue by creating synthetic bubble assets from live Binance market data when backend data is unavailable. All three requirements appear to be addressed through changes to useBubbleAssets.ts (convergence calculation), BubbleVisualization.tsx (rendering and error handling), and supporting files for visual mapping and surface display.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extensive info/alert UI components in BubbleVisualizationTabSurface.tsx showing connection status, synthetic data warnings, and legend with trend colors
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any UI enhancements for status indicators, alerts, or legend displays. The requirements focus only on fixing the filtering logic, convergence calculation, and error handling - not adding new UI elements for data source transparency.

hallucinated_features.description: Created bubbleVisualMapping.ts with color interpolation utilities and visual mapping functions for convergence-to-size and trend-to-color
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states as a non-goal: 'Changing the visual design or layout of the bubble visualization'. While mapping convergence to size may be necessary for display, the color interpolation utility appears to be beyond the scope of fixing the filtering logic.
